mapper.select: SELECT SRCHWRD FROM ( SELECT SRCHWRD ,MAX(REGIST_PNTTM) REGIST_PNTTM FROM STN_GOODS_SEARCH WHERE ESNTL_ID = #{searchEsntlId} GROUP BY SRCHWRD LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} ) t ORDER BY REGIST_PNTTM DESC

SELECT SRCHWRD ,HIT_CO FROM ( SELECT SRCHWRD ,COUNT(*) HIT_CO FROM STN_GOODS_SEARCH WHERE REGIST_PNTTM BETWEEN SYSDATE() - INTERVAL #{value} DAY AND SYSDATE() GROUP BY SRCHWRD ) t ORDER BY HIT_CO DESC LIMIT 10
